thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning, from Tokyo, where Iâ€™m hosting our WSJ CEO Council. Top business leaders and policy makers, including the U.S. ambassadors to China and Japan, and SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son, are among attendees gathering to discuss topics on global trade tension, political upheaval and tech innovation. In an interview, new Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad said that he expects to remain in power for one to two years following a surprise election victory earlier this month. Follow our discussion here as it unfolds during the day.
Family Feud
